name: anachronistic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
existing out of its time in history: He described the law as anachronistic and ridiculous. Anachronistic mechanical voting machines are gone, replaced with computerized scanners. See
anachronism
More examplesFewer examplesIn the corner sat that anachronistic piece of furniture the cabinet TV, repurposed as a stereo speaker.An anachronistic rotary phone is attached to the wall.The language of the novel is delightfully anachronistic.
